name: wasmoon
description: A real lua VM with JS bindings made with webassembly

scripts.build:wasm:cmake: mkdir -p build && emcmake cmake -S . -B build/ -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release && cd build/ && emmake make
scripts.build:wasm:cmake:dev: mkdir -p build && emcmake cmake -S . -B build/ && cd build/ && emmake make
scripts.build:wasm:docker: mkdir -p build && docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/src -u $(id -u):$(id -g) emscripten/emsdk bash -c 'emcmake cmake -S . -B build/ -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release && cd build/ && emmake make'
scripts.build:wasm:docker:dev: mkdir -p build && docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/src -u $(id -u):$(id -g) emscripten/emsdk bash -c 'emcmake cmake -S . -B build/ -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release && cd build/ && emmake make'

author: ceifa
